desc: We offer delicious and nutritious meals delivered - directly to you. We only use high quality ingredients that are fresh, such as free range chicken and grass fed beef. All our packaging is also biodegradable and eco-friendly!

layout.text: FORKIN’ NUTRITIOUS PRE-MADE MEALS DELIVERED FRESH TO YOUR DOOR

Don’t let the hassle of food shopping and meal prepping keep you from achieving your fitness goals. Get access to pre-made nutritious meals with just a few clicks! We offer some of the best pre-made meals in NZ designed by fitness experts, allowing you to consume your targeted macros and micro-nutrient meals easily and conveniently!

If you want fresh and delicious meals prepared safely with your nutrition needs in mind, order Forkit meals today.
